revised_title: The Cold Bokkeveld Meteorite: Further Particulars of its Fall and Witness Testimonies
tldr: The author, Thomas Maclear, provides detailed accounts of the fall of the Cold Bokkeveld meteorite, including witness testimonies and descriptions of the meteorite's impact sites. The meteorite was found to have fallen in an irregular valley, and its fragments were collected from various locations. The author also discusses the meteorite's impact on the local landscape and climate.
